chara.textHome: Why, hello there.
This is your Coordinator and ally to all,@Mitama Yakumo.
I may not look it, but I'm still very young@and always ready to party.
I can be found strengthening magic@with various items and selling@wares of my own design.
Why not have a look?♪
The logic behind touching another's magic?
Hmm, it's like a magnet perhaps?
If their magic energy is "N",@then my own is "S".
I can touch it just fine!♪
Does this mean it's okay to tinker with@everyone more than I already do?@*Giggle*
I feel awakened somehow,@and motivated to work even harder.
Since I can't fight, becoming stronger@just helps me feel a little better@ and nothing more, though.
I do wish to become strong enough to fend@for myself when Momoko and the others@aren't around to protect their Coordinator.
Without the power to fight, selling items like@this is a survival technique for me.
I'm absolutely not exploiting the others@to get Grief Seeds, nope...
Ah, I just thought of a new business venture♪
Welcome!
You must have some nerve@to keep the Coordinator waiting.
I'll have you keep me company@for the whole day!
I'd like start my morning right and@cook my own breakfast, but...
*Sigh*@I wonder if Yachiyo, Iroha, or Momoko@would make something for me...
I'm in student mode during the day!
Even with bad attendance,@my grades are always at the top.
I can't blame anyone for being jealous.
I get very busy this time of the day,@dealing with all kinds of Magical Girls.
Now, now,@don't touch anything on that shelf.
*Yaaawn*
Oh, I'm already getting sleepy...
I'm done being Coordinator for today.
That's the benefit of having@irregular business hours!
I don't mind being busy in the evenings,@but I get so lonely when@my customers are gone.
Could you keep me company@for a little while?
Another day of exterminating Witches@for Grief Seeds.
Good luck, everyone!
If you take Felicia with you,@it'll be done in no time.
That's right, I'll need everyone to solve the@mystery of the Endless Mirrors.
And I'll be here with all my items, ready@and waiting for them to come back safely.
I try to show up at school from time to time.
I have to juggle my job as a Coordinator too,@so my attendance is barely enough@to move on to the next grade.
So, what kind of adjustments@do you need me to make?
If you don't tell me in 10 seconds,@I'm going to choose what I mess with!
Too bad, so sad!
Aren't you naughty,@touching my products without permission.
Oh, I know!@It's not much of a punishment, but@why don't you cook with me?
I love sitting next to the heater.
Once I'm there, I don't ever budge.
Unless I need to go to the bathroom or@take a bath, I'm always in snuggle mode.
Thanks to my neutral position as@Coordinator, this area is a @safe no-fighting zone.
*Chuckle*@It's a great place to escape to, isn't it?
I do feel bad for always relying on Momoko@to fight Familiars and Witches for me.
But she's too nice,@I can't help depending on her.
Kanagi just pops out of nowhere all the time.
Still, she's the only one I can talk with@ about my past, so I can't get mad at her.
What am I going to do with all@these Grief Seeds I'm collecting?
Well, all I can say is that I need them@to purify my Soul Gem in my line of work.
Take that, and that, and that!
I hit pesky rascals like you in@places that weaken their magic!
*Chuckle*@I'm only joking, of course!
I don't really want to get my hands dirty,@but...
My my, not too shabby, if I do say so myself!
I'm so nervous, my heart is pounding...
Your Coordinator would appreciate@a compliment or two!
Thank you, everyone, you're all a big help.
Oh my, I can't allow this.@It's my job to be the@Coordinator for everyone.
Monopolizing me is a no-no!
*Giggle*
Well anyway, it's a pleasure to@make your acquaintance.
Hmm, "enhancement"...@I could get used to this, don't you agree?
No one else can be allowed to see this side@of the Coordinator, is that clear?
Some things must remain a mystery@no matter how much you wish to know.
But I'll make an exception this time♪
You can find your Coordinator in@Shinsei Ward, inconspicuously hidden@within a building down a back alley.
Word of mouth alone has made@my business boom...
*Giggle*@Nevermind, nothing♪
The concentration of Witches and@Magical Girls in Kamihama is high.
Due to that, magic energy condenses into@various crystals.
Bring the crystals to me and I'll make them@into something useful for you.
Trick or treat♪
Those who don't buy@something may get@tricked... *Chuckle*
We have pleeenty of@costumes at the@Coordinator's, too!
...or at least we would,@if I'd thought@that far ahead.
Hi, welcome♪
How about the@Coordinator's handmade@Jack-o'-lantern?
Unfortunately,@I have no candy left...
Ahh, maybe I'm also@about to get tricked?
Since the morning,@I've been thinking on
what kind of cute@customers will be@passing by today♪
If one of them makes@my heart skip a beat,
I might give them@some special service!
I wonder what would@food for Halloween be?
Pumpkin Soup?
Offering lunch as a special@service would be nice,
but the color's not@very appealing.
...Maybe I'll put@my own spin on it!
Enough joking.@You should buy something.
Because on Halloween,@the real Witches@keep moving around.
Soon, it'll be the time@when they're most active.
It's getting late,@so why don't you go@visit some houses?
I think a Magical Girl@outfit should look like a@costume, right? *Chuckle*
I want to do it. A costume@party for Magical Girls; so@cute just thinking about it♪
Even if she makes@a fuss about it,
I really want to dress@Momoko up in something.
A day when two lovers can@only meet once a year...
*Giggle*
It's quite romantic@if you think about it~.
While I don't have my own@Hikoboshi who visits me,
I'm glad that I have@plenty of customers@that come by instead~.
The Coordinator is@currently holding a@Summer Triangle campaign!
I'll be giving out@star-shaped cookies to@those that use my service.
Welcome♪
Events are important too,
but adjustments@come first~.
Now then, I need to put up@the Tanabata decorations@before people arrive.
If you help me out,@I'll give you a discount@on adjustments for today~.
*Sigh*...
It's so hot and humid now@that I'm sweating@while adjusting...
If only I had a kind-hearted@assistant who would@gently wipe off my sweat...
According to@the weather forecast,
it'll be clear skies@with not a cloud in sight@even at nighttime.
Thank goodness~.
This precious day@only comes once a year,
so it'd be a shame if@Orihime and Hikoboshi@couldn't reunite.
Even though I'm@serious about my work,
I'd like to go stargazing@with everyone else@for Tanabata too...
Alright, I've decided!
I'm going to@close up shop for today!
I decided to splurge a bit@and bought some@fake bamboo branches~.
I'll wish for everyone@to be able to celebrate@Tanabata next year as well.
Welcome♪
The Coordinator's@moon viewing campaign@is now in session!
Be sure not to miss it~.
Oh, you came here@at a good time.
Right now,@everyone's making@moon viewing dango.
Care to join us?
Since we decided to have@a moon viewing party@on such short notice,
there are some girls@that don't know@about it still.
It'd make me happier@if you could help@advertise it~.
You have to go@exterminate a Witch now?
I see, then let me@give you some extra@dango to go at least.
What a nice morning~.
Looks like the sky@will be filled with stars@instead of clouds tonight.
Perhaps because the moon@viewing festival is later, the@sun tried extra hard today.
...As if~.@That just sounds like@something from a fairy tale.
Yay, I was able to@cleanly crack an egg!
But if this is supposed@to be a motif for the@moon in the night sky,
it should be fine@to make the egg whites@black, right?
Alright,@time to turn up the heat!
The moon should be@visible any second now...
Ah, there it is!
What a beautiful full moon!
You can see the@rabbit on it, too~.
...Oh, no,@I don't actually@believe in all that.
I'm starting to get@REALLY tired@as the night goes on...
Oh, how about I@adjust you outside while@moon viewing this time?
We'll be able to relax more,@so the adjustment might@be more successful.
Preparing for the@moon viewing festival@sure is tough.
But this year, since Mii was@worried, we made moon@viewing dango together.
*Chuckle*@She's a sweet girl.
